notes:
On April 23rd, Kansas reported 112 deaths.  On April 24th, they revised this down to 111 deaths.
As of May 7, 2020, confirmed and probable cases are included in the case totals.
From July 1-3 we reported incorrect numbers for KS Positive Cases (PCR). We have corrected the error.
On July 15 KS began reporting additional data from hospitals. Cumulative on ventilator dropped by 1 with no explanation. Currently hospitalized with COVID-19 data dates from 7/10.
name: Kansas
